City Council
============

Meetings
--------

Boerne City Council holds regularly scheduled meetings at 6 p.m. on the second and fourth Tuesday of each month at City Hall, 447 N. Main Street.

* [Public Participation in Open Meetings](https://www.ci.boerne.tx.us/DocumentCenter/View/12982)

### Agendas and Minutes

Agendas will be published at least three business days prior to each meeting and can be found within the [calendar](https://www.ci.boerne.tx.us/calendar.aspx?CID=19,14,40) event. Meeting packets will be published no later than 72 hours before each meeting. Minutes are available following approval.

* [Agendas and Minutes](https://boerne.legistar.com/Calendar.aspx)

### Watch Live and Recorded Meetings

All City Council meetings can be watched [live or recorded](https://www.ci.boerne.tx.us/1844/Watch-Live-Recorded-Meetings) online and on the City of Boerne [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/BoerneCityHall).

* [City Calendar](https://www.ci.boerne.tx.us/calendar.aspx?CID=14)

---

City Council Members
--------------------

The five current council members listed below are elected by the residents in their district and serve on staggered three-year terms.

* [Email All Council Members](mailto:%20ccouncil@boerne-tx.gov)
* [Interactive Council District Map](https://www.ci.boerne.tx.us/584/Single-Member-District-Voting-Map)
